short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to rapidly search through all one's chrome bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want a way to easily search though your bookmarks? Just press Ctrl+Shift+L (or whatever other shortcut you change it to) and start typing.

To navigate the options either use Ctrl+J and Ctrl+K to go down and up or the Up and Down arrow keys to do so.
